wikipedia_page.main: Raymond Joseph "Ray" Veall (born 16 March 1943) is an English former professional footballer who played as a left winger for Doncaster Rovers, Everton, Preston North End and Huddersfield Town in the Football League during the 1960s. He also played for the Los Angeles Wolves in the North American Soccer League.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: *Ray Veall, started his career at Skegness Town in 1960 before winning the 1962–63 League Championship with Everton.
